terraform.tfvars
files.content:
aws_region      = "us-east-1"
project_name    = "tla-example"
environment     = "dev"

# IMPORTANT: set this to your built image in ECR (or other registry)
# Example:
# container_image = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/tla-example-dev:latest"
container_image = "public.ecr.aws/docker/library/python:3.11-slim"

desired_count = 1

task_cpu    = 256
task_memory = 512

# Ensure your app responds 200 on this path
health_check_path = "/"

# HTTPS + custom domain (optional)
enable_https    = false
certificate_arn = null

domain_name    = null
hosted_zone_id = null

# GitHub OIDC (optional)
enable_github_oidc = false
github_org         = null
github_repo        = null
github_branch      = "main"
